text: Azariah became the father of Seraiah. Seraiah became the father of Jehozadak.
As Judas and his army were approaching the flowing wadi, Timothy said to the officers of his army: â€œIf he crosses over to us first, we shall not be able to resist him; he will certainly defeat us.
If anyone wants to go to law with you over your tunic, hand him your cloak as well.
And they ridiculed him. Then he put them all out. He took along the child's father and mother and those who were with him and entered the room where the child was.
But you do not want to come to me to have life.
After recalling the apostles, they had them flogged, ordered them to stop speaking in the name of Jesus, and dismissed them.
